title: Onboard New Reseller Partner
description: A new reseller partner has signed a contract and needs to be set up in the system and trained.

tasks.description: Create a new partner account in the CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the new partner in the system.

tasks.description: Grant the partner access to the partner portal, which contains marketing materials and deal registration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provisions access to the partner portal.

tasks.description: Schedule a welcome and training session with the new partner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the partner onboarding session.
